commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
def Nhap():
    print("Nhap mot so nguyen:")
    n = int(input("n="))
    return n
def Tinh(n):
    S=0
    for i in range(1,n+1):
        S+=i
    return S
def InKQ(n,S):
    print('Tong cua ',n,' so nguyen duong dau tien=',S,sep='')

n=Nhap()
S=Tinh(n)
InKQ(n,S)
